text: Guanwu National Forest Recreation Area () is a forest located in Wufeng Township, Hsinchu County and Tai'an Township, Miaoli County in Taiwan. ==Geology== The forest spans over an area of 907 hectares and is located at an elevation of 1,500-2,500 meters. It has an annual mean temperature of 13°C. It has several waterfalls with the 30-meter Guanwu Waterfall is the most notable one. ==See also== * Geography of Taiwan ==References== Category:Geography of Hsinchu County Category:Geography of Miaoli County Category:National forest recreation areas in Taiwan Category:Tourist attractions in Hsinchu County Category:Tourist attractions in Miaoli County
title: Guanwu National Forest Recreation Area
